blogs.title: Welcome to the Super Mario Another Galaxy Blog!
blogs.summary: Welcome to the official SMAG Blog, your source for news, updates, and developer stories from Super Mario Another Galaxy!

blogs.title: Space Port Galaxy: A Developer's Journey
blogs.summary: The backdoor development and evolution of Space Port Galaxy, a challenging SMAG level inspired by Dreadnought Galaxy.

blogs.title: A (simplified) Journey Through My 3D Modeling Evolution
blogs.summary: From complete beginner to nintendo level 3D artist, a walkthrough of all the canceled models and learning phases that shaped SMAG's development.
